name: Grape Jam
description:
Grape Jam is a short but tough physics-based 3D platformer where you must control a bundle of grapes through a series of puzzles and platforming challenges. The more grapes that make it to the end the more jam you make!

Controls
Controller is highly recommended.

Controller:
- Left joystick = Movement
- Right Joystick = Camera
- A = Jump
- Left/Right Triggers = Expand/Contract group
- Left/Right Bumpers = Rotate group
- B = Trim/Add grapes
- D-pad Up/Down = Zoom camera in/out

Keyboard:
- WASD = Movement
- Mouse = Camera
- Space = Jump
- Left/Right Click = Expand/Contract group
- Q/E = Rotate group
- C = Trim/Add grapes
- Arrow key Up/Down = Zoom camera in/out
